title: Analyze Exit Interview Data
description: An HR analyst needs to analyze the exit interview data from the last quarter to identify trends in why employees are leaving.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all exit interview feedback from the last quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst pulls the raw data from the HRIS.

tasks.description: Categorize and tally the reasons for leaving (e.g., compensation, management, career growth).
Create a report for leadership summarizing the top reasons for turnover.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a presentation showing that 'lack of career growth' was the top reason for voluntary turnover.
